longDescription.description: Mechanisms for verifying and authorizing users in a system.
longDescription.importance: Authentication and authorization are essential for protecting user data and ensuring the integrity of systems.

longDescription.details: Explore different authentication methods, including passwords, biometrics, tokens, and multi-factor authentication.
longDescription.learningOutcome: Gain a solid understanding of the strengths and weaknesses of various authentication methods.

longDescription.details: Learn about authorization techniques such as role-based access control (RBAC), attribute-based access control (ABAC), and OAuth2.
longDescription.learningOutcome: Develop expertise in designing and implementing authorization mechanisms for different applications.

longDescription.details: Understand how to manage user sessions securely, including session tokens, session expiration, and session hijacking prevention.
longDescription.learningOutcome: Gain practical skills in implementing secure session management strategies.

longDescription.details: Explore federated authentication protocols like SAML, OAuth2, and OpenID Connect.
longDescription.whenToUse: When dealing with multiple authentication providers or integrating with external services.
longDescription.expectedOutcome: Gain expertise in implementing federated authentication solutions.

longDescription.details: Discuss security considerations related to authentication and authorization, including password security, phishing attacks, and CSRF.
longDescription.learningOutcome: Develop a strong understanding of the security risks associated with authentication and authorization and how to mitigate them.

longDescription.details: Explore advanced authentication techniques such as biometrics, multi-factor authentication, and risk-based authentication.
longDescription.whenToUse: When requiring enhanced security or dealing with high-risk applications.
longDescription.expectedOutcome: Gain knowledge of cutting-edge authentication methods.

longDescription.details: Review industry best practices for authentication and authorization, including standards, guidelines, and recommendations.
longDescription.learningOutcome: Develop an understanding of best practices to ensure robust and secure authentication and authorization mechanisms.
